mapper.select: select count(*) from users where subject_id=#{subjectId}

select rownum, u_id as "userId", u_name as "userName", major , grade, subject_name as "subjectName" from( select rownum as rnum, u_id , u_name, major, grade, subject_name from( select u_id , u_name, major, grade, subject_name from( select u_id , u_name, major, grade, s.subject_name from users u, subject s where #{subjectId} = s.subject_id and u.subject_id = #{subjectId} and major != '관리자' ) order by grade desc, u_id asc ) where rownum <= #{end} ) where rnum >= #{start}

SELECT u.u_id as "userId", u_name as "userName", major, grade, phone, u_type as "userType", password, email, u.subject_id as "subjectId", s.subject_name as "subjectName", f.u_file_id as "userFileId", f.u_file_name as "userFileName", f.u_file_size as "userFileSize", f.u_file_content_type as "userFileContentType"
FROM subject s , users u LEFT OUTER JOIN u_file f ON u.u_id =f.u_id WHERE u.u_id = #{userId} and u.subject_id = s.subject_id

SELECT u_file_id as "userFileId", u_id as "userId", u_file_name as "userFileName", u_file_size as "userFileSize", u_file_content_type as "userFileContentType", u_file_data AS "userFileData" FROM U_FILE WHERE U_FILE_ID=#{userFileId}

select rownum, sub_att_no as "subAttNo", u_id as "userId", u_name as "userName", sub_attendance_title as "title", sub_att_date as "writeDate", result from( select rownum as rnum, sub_att_no , u_id, u_name, sub_attendance_title, sub_att_date, result from( select sub_att_no , u_id, u_name, sub_attendance_title, sub_att_date, result from( select sub_att_no, u.u_id, u.u_name, sub_attendance_title, sub_att_date, result from users u, sub_attendance s where u.u_id = s.u_id and result = #{result} ) order by sub_att_no desc ) where rownum <= #{end} ) where rnum >= #{start}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO U_FILE (U_FILE_ID, U_ID, U_FILE_NAME, U_FILE_SIZE, U_FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, U_FILE_DATA) VALUES (#{userFileId}, #{userId}, #{userFileName}, #{userFileSize}, #{userFileContentType}, #{userFileData})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET u_name=#{userName}, grade=#{grade}, password=#{password}, EMAIL=#{email}, phone=#{phone} WHERE u_id=#{userId}
UPDATE u_file SET u_file_name=#{userFileName}, u_file_size=#{userFileSize}, u_file_content_type=#{userFileContentType},u_file_data=#{userFileData} WHERE u_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO u_file (u_file_id, u_id, u_file_name, u_file_size, u_file_content_type, u_file_data) VALUES (SEQ_U_FILE_ID.nextval, #{userId}, #{userFileName}, #{userFileSize}, #{userFileContentType}, #{userFileData})
mapper.select: SELECT SUB_ATTENDANCE.SUB_ATT_NO as subAttNo, SUB_ATT_TIME as subAttTime, SUB_LEAVE_TIME as subLeaveTime, CONTENT as content, RESULT as result, SUB_ATTENDANCE_TITLE as subAttendanceTitle, SUB_ATT_DATE as subAttDate, SUB_STATUS as subStatus, U_ID as userId, SA_FILE_ID as fileId, SA_FILE_NAME as fileName, SA_FILE_SIZE as fileSize, SA_FILE_CONTENT_TYPE as fileContentType FROM SUB_ATTENDANCE LEFT OUTER JOIN SUB_ATT_FILE ON SUB_ATTENDANCE.SUB_ATT_NO = SUB_ATT_FILE.SUB_ATT_NO WHERE SUB_ATTENDANCE.SUB_ATT_NO = #{subAttNo}
